definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: I can play "Spinning Song" quite well now.
sentences.chinese: 我現在能把“織布歌”全彈下來了。

sentences.english: The loom is controlled by a system of stiff punch cards and hooks.
sentences.chinese: 織布機的控制裝置由硬打孔卡和吊鉤組成。

sentences.english: The container has to be covered with a clean cloth, making the receptacle dustproof sealed.
sentences.chinese: 容器用清潔織布覆蓋，插座防塵密封。

sentences.english: Color weaving to import products, cotton products imported per cent negative growth.
sentences.chinese: 色織布爲主要進口產品，純棉類產品進口同比負增長。

sentences.english: None of these fabrics is woven or knitted.
sentences.chinese: 這種線圈結構讓針織布比梭織布更有彈性。

sentences.english: None of these fabrics is woven or knitted.
sentences.chinese: 這種線圈結構讓針織布比梭織布更有彈性。

sentences.english: Maya, a weaver, works at a loom in the Jhoole studio to create a traditional sari.
sentences.chinese: 工作室在一架織布機工作設計一件傳統的莎麗服。

sentences.english: The device used to weave together warp and weft threads is called a loom.
sentences.chinese: 用於編織在一起經紗和緯紗的設備被稱爲一臺織布機。

sentences.english: This embroidery weaving system is aimed at producing fabrics for e. g. curtains and shirting.
sentences.chinese: 此臺繡花織布機主要用於織造窗簾布和襯衫面料等。

sentences.english: A white binder for level cloths auto-printing.
sentences.chinese: 機器印花用白糊，平織布專用。

sentences.english: Buy secondhand cloth or reuse fabric.
sentences.chinese: 買二手布或可再使用的編織布。

sentences.english: We have a new supplier of hand dyed fabric called Picture this Plus.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個新的供應商的手色織布所謂的影像加。

sentences.english: The shuttle flies back and forth on the loom.
sentences.chinese: 織布機上梭子來回飛動。
耐磨性，較高密織布網狀物。

sentences.english: This fan is leather belt type high-powered bibulous fan, weaving of the water that offer spray is special.
sentences.chinese: 本風機是傳送帶式高質量吸水風機，供噴水織布特用。

sentences.english: Jennifer machine can enable large-scale weaving factory to build.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮機的呈現，使大範圍的織布廠得以樹立。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
